headline: Letter: Vanceâ€™s pro-life stance makes him stand out
sentences: I encourage you to consider the endorsements of the Ohio Right to Life and President Trump when you vote May 3rd.
In the race for U.S. Senate, there is only one candidate endorsed by the Ohio Right to Life and President Trump.
There is a lot being said about the other candidates on the issue of life.
in this crowded field says more about his opponents than it does him.
The Ohio Right to Life took an unusual step by endorsing just J.D.
They normally issue co-endorsements in primaries.
Their choice to endorse just J.D.
